thread.title: Angola: Nestle Announces Awareness Campaign On Good Nutrition
thread.title_full: Angola: Nestle Announces Awareness Campaign On Good Nutrition

title: Angola: Nestle Announces Awareness Campaign On Good Nutrition
text:
Kenya: Polio Vaccination Kicks Off in 32 High Risk Counties 
The action is aimed at publicising on nutrition to the populations and the access to healthy and tasty food in order to improve the quality of life for all. 
According to the official, Nestlé is committed to fight against micronutrient deficiencies in Angola through the fortification of its products. 
In order to ensure the efficiency of the action, Wilbart de Wit said that Nestlé has created a four-year nutritional education programme with Ministries of Education and Health to launch a manual health children. 
Nestlé has been in Angola since 1955. 
With about 333,000 employees, the food processing company is represented in more than 150 countries, operating with 443 plants in 81 countries. Angola
